entities.name: neville longbottom
entities.description: Neville Longbottom is described as someone taller than the narrator's sister and has longer hair than Harry Potter. He appears excited, with torn robes and a cut face.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as someone who has seen Neville's long hair before.

relationships.description: Neville Longbottom knew that Harry Potter would come, as evidenced by his excited reaction when he sees Harry.
